Title: Obi worries about drug trafficking through courier services
Summary: Peter Obi has expressed deep concern over reports that drug traffickers are increasingly using courier and delivery services to distribute narcotics across Nigeria . Labour Party (LP) presidential candidate in 2023, Peter Obi, has expressed concern over the reports .

Title: Anambra guber: INEC, NSA warn against violence, voter inducement
Summary: Chairman of the Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC), Prof Joash Amupitan, has warned that any attempt to induce voters before or during the November 8, 2025, Anambra governorship election will be firmly resisted by the commission and security agencies .

Title: $1tr economy by 2030 achievable, says Bagudu
Summary: $1trillion economy target set by Tinubu administration for 2030 is achievable, says Bagudu . Minister of Budget and Economic Planning said the target was achievable .

Title: Nigeria extracts diesel from plastic waste
Summary: Nigeria has taken another bold stride toward sustainable environmental innovation with the successful demonstration of a plastic waste-to-diesel conversion technology . The demonstration was organized by Premium Blue Economy Innovations and Investments Limited .

Title: Soyinka alleges witch-hunt as U.S. revokes visa
Summary: Nobel laureate, Professor Wole Soyinka, has announced that the United States of America has revoked his non-immigrant visa, immediately making his entry into the country impossible . Soyinka alleges witch-hunt as U.S. revokes visa .

Title: Town Planning: Tinubu urges state govts to domesticate national urban dev’t policy
Summary: President Bola Tinubu has tasked states to domesticate the National Urban Development Policy . The policy will bolster town planning, according to the president .

Title: Developing Nigeria’s livestock industry, our priority – Minister
Summary: Maiha said that to achieve the desired sector development and global competitiveness, the country must first transform its animal breeds while preserving their genetic heritage .

Title: Life gradually returns to deserted Igbo communities formerly occupied by unknown gunmen
Summary: The South-East region was under attack by criminal elements who killed, kidnapped, destroyed and devastated communities in Igbo land . Life gradually returns to  communities formerly occupied by unknown gunmen .

Title: PDP Crisis: George faults Lamido for threatening to take ‘internal maters’ to court
Summary: Despite the controversy, George said Lamido should follow due process and avoid dragging the party's internal affairs before the courts . George said the PDP leader should not drag the party’s internal affairs into court .

Title: We’ve received threats from terrorists to bomb NASS – Reps raise alarm
Summary: Chairman of House of Representatives Committee on Internal Security, Garba Muhammad, revealed yesterday that the National Assembly has received threats from terrorists to bomb the complex . He stressed the urgent need to strengthen security within the nation's highest legislative institution .

States to earn over N4tn yearly from VAT reforms
